description.@value:
In unmittelbarer Nähe zum Waldfestplatz und zum Scheulingwald befindet sich der Sport- und Freizeitpark Mayrhofen

Die Anlage besteht aus:
Kunstrasen-Fußballfeld (100 x 65 m Nettofläche), 
3-bahnige 100-Meter-Laufbahn, 
Weit- und Hochsprunganlage, 
Mehrzeck-Spielplatz von 24 x 22 m (Handball, Basketball und Volleyball), 
Street-Soccer-Platz von 22 x 12 m, der von Bahnen umschlossen ist, 
Beachvolleyballplatz, (2 Spielflächen), 
erlebnisreicher Kinderspielplatz und 
Skatepool.

Die Anlage ist allgemein zugänglich, wobei auf die festgesetzten Betriebszeiten zu achten ist:
Mai bis Oktober: täglich von 8:00 - 21:00 Uhr 
November bis April: täglich von 8:00 Uhr - Einbruch der Dunkelheit.
Bei Eis sowie Schneelage bleibt die Anlage geschlossen!

Very close to the Forest Festival Area and Scheulingwald is the sports and leisure park Mayrhofen

The plant consists of:
Artificial turf football field (100 x 65 m net area)
3-lane 100-meter running track,
Long and high jump facility,
Playground 24 x 22 m (handball, basketball and volleyball)
Street soccer field of 22 x 12 m, which is surrounded by paths,
Beach volleyball court, (2 play areas)
eventful children's playground and
Skate Pool.

The plant is widely available, while ensuring the set operating times:
May to October: Everyday from 8:00 am - 21:00 clock
November to April: daily from 8:00 clock - nightfall!
By ice and snow the court will be closed!

There's another new playground right next to the sports ground. Two climbing frames, including slides, a sandpit, classic swings, a basket and baby swing, plus trampoline intgrated in the gound, will keep boredom at bay on the 1,200 square metres of the premises.
M-Town Bowl, a second-to-none, top skate park measuring 504 square metres and with heights of 1.30 to 1.80 metres, is situated directly opposite. The establishment is open daily from 9.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. and has become a meeting place for the Zillertal's skate scene. And what's more - it's situated against the unique panorama of the Zillertal mountains. Open form May to Novemberbetween 9.00 a.m. and 9.00 p.m.
